events.name: Battletech Grinder
events.description: Test your metal in the Battletech Grinder!  Start in a light 'mech and work your way all the way up to an assault class.

events.name: Death Star II: Star Wars Mass Battle
events.description: Join Lando in leading the assault or help the Empire destroy them & salvage the loss of the Emperor.

events.name: Lost Religion Found-Side Quest: A Good XenoCon
events.description: Slogging through the frozen wasteland, you see artifacts from a distant age. You stumble across a large sygil etched in the ice. 7th Level. No prior experience with LRF is needed.

events.name: X-Wing Hunger Games
events.description: Be the last ship standing & win the 2nd Annual Hunger Games

events.name: Paint a Harry Potter Ornament Set
events.description: Each student will receive a set of hand cut clay ornaments to decorate. Ornaments are easy to paint because they are all stamped with image detail.
